home.text_1: Turning Vision Into Reality With Code And Logic.
home.text_2: Greetings and welcome to my portfolio. My name is Damar and I reside in Indonesia. I am a programmer developer specialized in frontend, backend, and blockchain development. My expertise lies primarily in backend development. For more detailed information about my programming skills, please see my skills page.
